chart.name: chart.distribution.sales.by.product.over.duration
chart.title: Distribution of Sales By Product
chart.dataset: SELECT _product.name AS names, SUM(_orderLine.qty) AS quantity FROM Order self INNER JOIN OrderLine _orderLine ON self.id = _orderLine.productOrder LEFT JOIN Product _product ON _orderLine.product = _product.id Where self.orderDate >= :fromDate AND self.orderDate <= :toDate Group by _product.name

chart.name: chart.number.qty.sold.per.productFamily
chart.title: Number of quantities sold per product family
chart.dataset: SELECT pf.name AS productFamilyName, SUM(_orderLine.qty) AS quantity FROM OrderLine AS _orderLine LEFT JOIN Product AS product ON _orderLine.product = product.id LEFT JOIN ProductFamily AS pf ON product.productFamily = pf.id GROUP BY pf.name ORDER BY pf.name

chart.name: chart.accounting.balance
chart.title: Accounting Balance
chart.dataset: SELECT acc.fullName AS accountFullName, (SUM(accEntryLine.debit) - SUM(accEntryLine.credit)) AS balance FROM AccountingEntryLine AS accEntryLine INNER JOIN Account acc ON acc.id = accEntryLine.account GROUP BY acc.fullName ORDER BY acc.fullName
